Package com.mygdx.game

Class NewGameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
com.mygdx.game.NewGameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class NewGameScreen extends GameScreen
Screen displayed at the beginning of a new game. Includes difficulty and player selection.
Author:
Franck Limtung (flimtung), Kevin Chen (kchen546)
